com.ibm.dm.frontService.sm.intfc
Interface IModelHandle

All Known Subinterfaces:
IInputModelHandle, IOutputModelHandle
public interface IModelHandle

Method Summary
 java.lang.String getBase()
          Answers with the base URI of the model name space.
 com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Model getModel()
          Answers with the entire model in the handler, which provides for an efficient way of obtaining that model from the handle.
 IOntologyHandle getOntology()
          The etag of a model is a representation of the version of the entire model while each individual resource in that model may have their own etag to reflect on their individual versions.
 java.lang.String getRdfXML()
          Returns a String that contains the entire RDF model in RDF/XML format.
 

Method Detail

getRdfXML

java.lang.String getRdfXML()
Returns a String that contains the entire RDF model in RDF/XML format.

Returns:
String containing the RDF in XML/RDF format.

getOntology

IOntologyHandle getOntology()
The etag of a model is a representation of the version of the entire model while each individual resource in that model may have their own etag to reflect on their individual versions. It is possible that no such value is maintained in the model.

Returns:
a Date representing the etag of the entire model, or null if such is not possible to maintain in the model.

getModel

com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Model getModel()
Answers with the entire model in the handler, which provides for an efficient way of obtaining that model from the handle.

Returns:
a Model that is maintained within this handle.

getBase

java.lang.String getBase()
Answers with the base URI of the model name space. This one may be null since it is not clear how to make out which NS is the base of the model.

Returns:
String for the name space URI, or null.
